help.description: Shows a list of all commands, or shows info about a command.
help.missingPerms: I need the Manage Messages permission to run the paginated help command!
help.unknown: I can't seem to find that command... Maybe try giving a valid command next time?

extended.extendedHelp: The help command shows a paginated list of all commands by their categories, or the extended information of a command if provided.
